item.title: Problems with digital 'ownership'
item.description: Introduction. What I mean by ‘digital ownership’ i1s the online purchasing of media or subscriptions through platforms like Amazon Prime Video, Netflix, and Hulu. Spotify, SoundCloud, and Apple Music. Steam, Epic Games Store, and EA. The Problem. You do not own what you purchase. When purchased digitally the consumer is paying to lease media which expires whenever the company you purchased it through feels like it. It’s a serious issue when media purchased is out of the control of the user and is unable to be used offline without the need to sign into any account.
